
   .frontpage-promotion {
			background-color: ##ddd;
			height: 250px;
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .one-item {
			width: 33.333%;
			float: left;
			height: 100%;
			position: relative;
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .article-link {
			background-color: white;
			background-repeat: no-repeat;
			background-position: 50% 50%;
			display: block;
			margin: 15px;
			border: 4px solid white;
			height: 208px;
			position: relative;
			text-decoration: none;
			border-radius: 15px;
			box-shadow: inset 0 0 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .article-link:hover {
			border-color: ##fbfb93;
			box-shadow: inset 0 0 50px rgba(255,255,255,0.6), 0 0 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .link-title {
			background-color: ##444;
			background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
			color: white;
			display: block;
			position: absolute;
			bottom: 0;
			width: 100%;
			padding: 5px 10px;
			height: 55px;
			font-size: 17px;
			line-height: 22px;
			text-align: center;
			border-radius: 0 0 12px 12px;
			text-shadow: 0 0 2px black, 0 0 2px black;
			-moz-box-sizing: border-box;
			-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
			-ms-box-sizing: border-box;
			box-sizing: border-box;
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .long-title {
				font-size:15px;
				height: auto !important;
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .comment-count {
			background-image: url(https://cdn.afterdawn.fi/v4/aftersprites.120213.png);
			background-repeat: no-repeat;
			background-position: 0 -720px;
			cursor: pointer;
			color: ##495664;
			opacity: 0.9;
			display: block;
			font-size: 20px;
			font-weight: bold;
			line-height: 0;
			height: 10px;
			position: absolute;
			right: 4px;
			bottom: 73px;
			padding: 28px 18px 26px 17px;
			text-align: center;
			width: 35px;
			text-decoration: none;
			}

			.frontpage-promotion .comment-count:hover {
			background-position: -70px -720px;
			color: ##376a9f;
			opacity: 1;
			text-shadow: 0 0 15px white;
			}

			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link:before {
			background-image: url(https://cdn.afterdawn.fi/v4/front-promo-labels.png);
			content:"""";
			width: 93px;
			height: 93px;
			position: absolute;
			top: -8px;
			left: -8px;
			display: none;
			}

			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link.puhelinvertailu:before {
			background-position: 0 0;
			display: block;
			}
			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link.edukas:before {
			background-position: -93px 0;
			display: block;
			}
			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link.hardware:before {
			background-position: -186px 0;
			display: block;
			}
			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link.hardwarer:before {
			background-position: -279px 0;
			display: block;
			}
			div.frontpage-promotion a.article-link.showroom:before {
			background-image: url(https://cdn.afterdawn.fi/v4/front-promo-label-showroom.png);
			display: block;
			}
			div.googleAdsInfo a.google_ads_feedback {
			color: ##999 !important;
			font-size: 0.85em;
			text-decoration: none;
			}
  
   .centerSection { margin-left: 8px; }
					#base-glow { background-position: -296px 0; }
					#base-glow { background-position: -296px 0; }
					#base-1 { background-position: 1px -60px; }
					#base-2 { background-position: 4px bottom; }
					#newsletterBar .content { margin-left: 0 !important; }
					#newsletterBar .shareButtons { right: 10px; }
  
   #newsletterBar { display: none !important; }
  
   @media (max-width: 1184px) {
				#ad-right-160x600-placeholder {
					display: none !important;
				}
			}
  
    .requiresJavascript { display: none;}
   
      .afterdawn-logo {
			background-image: url('data:image/gif;base64,');
			background-position: 10px 0;
			background-repeat: no-repeat;
			text-indent: 90px;
			color: #eee;
			position: absolute;
			margin: 0;
			padding: 3px 20px;
			font-size: 1.4em;
			background-color: rgb(60,60,60);
			width: 950px;
			-o-transition:.5s;
			-ms-transition:.5s;
			-moz-transition:.5s;
			-webkit-transition:.5s;
			transition:.5s;
		}
		.afterdawn-logo:hover {
			color: white;
			background-color: rgb(0,0,0);
		}
		#newsTickerHeadline {
			text-decoration: underline;
			padding: 3px 10px;
		}
		#newsTickerHeadline.recent {
			background-color: yellow;
			color: black;
			font-weight: bold;
		}
		#newsTickerTop div {
			position: relative;
			width: 990px;
			height: 2em;
			overflow: hidden;
		}
		#newsTickerCommentsContainer span {
			background-image: url(https://cdn.afterdawn.fi/v4/aftericons_main.110406.png);
			background-repeat: no-repeat;
			padding-left: 24px;
			height: 22px;
			background-position: 0 -525px;
		}
		#newsTickerTime {
			font-size: 0.6em;
		}
     
        div.footer{
				color: white;
				font-size: 1.1em;
			}
			div.footer .copy {
				clear: both;
				text-align: center;
				color: #aaa;
				padding: 10px;
			}
			div.footer .copy a {
				text-decoration: none;
			}
			div.footer img.icon {
				height: 1.1em;
			}
			div.footer .column h3 {
				margin-top: 35px;
			}
			div.footer .column div.move {
				position: relative;
				top: -25px;
				left: 32px;
			}
			.goToTop {
				position: absolute;
				bottom: 5px;
				right: 5px;
				font-size: 1.5em;
				font-weight: bold;
			}
			.goToTop a {
				text-decoration: none;
			}
